answers.author: Eric Norenberg
answers.text:
The City of Oberlin recently completed a parks and recreation strategic plan.  The website for the process is http://www.oberlinparksandrecplan.com/  Survey data, the draft plan, and other information are posted on the website.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
Eloy, AZ is considering a citywide survey re: Parks & Open Space Master Plan.  Copies/links of your survey(s) re: Parks, Open Space would be very helpful for this community.
Thank you!
Pamela G Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Parks & Open Space Survey
